name: Synaesthesia
description:
End of study project for Game Designer and 3D artists, students of Brassart Grenoble. 

Universe created by 4 3D artists. 

Gameplay made by 6 Game Designers.

Controls : Gamepad control :
Keyboard controls :

In the next big change update planned: 

- Rework of the enemy

- Turret Change

- Implementation of the scenario 

- Implementation of environmental narration 

- Minimum 1 complete room
